body_html:
This problem seems like it should be fixed in the GcsFileSystem object, so that all reader implementations will benefit. Can you look into doing that?

Since the problem seems to be specific to GCS, I'm going to transfer the review to @saeta, who is more familiar with that code (or who at least might know who knows it best).

body:
This problem seems like it should be fixed in the `GcsFileSystem` object, so that all reader implementations will benefit. Can you look into doing that?

Since the problem seems to be specific to GCS, I'm going to transfer the review to @saeta, who is more familiar with that code (or who at least might know who knows it best).
